content.detailedDescription:
The body was not a solid shape, it was curvy and looked like membrane or textured, had a tiny red light on top and bottom blinking. could of been a blimp, just didn't see anywhere pilot sat. no under charidge, it was a solid shape. no markings on it, and was huge. it was moving slowly. it was illuminated from within. 

it was very clear, no markings, but had a textured skin, like scales, thats why i thought i was a blimp of some type. though how it was driven there was nothing underneath just the blinking red light. 

i took photo with iphone. i will post three images. original, a blown up image and a original with increased explored to show size and location.
content.summary: Ufo seen over nutley nj - at night - 10-17-2013

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:47 pm mt i had stepped outside on my back (west facing) porch for a smoke and look at the crescent moon which was approximately 75 degrees above the western horizon, when i witnessed a bright green object falling from the sky almost due west from my position. the fall was very slow and not like any typical meteor or flare i have witnessed before. the descent was slow. from my initial sighting at approximately 60-70 degrees above the horizon until it disappeared at 4-5 degrees above the horizon was 2-3 seconds. the object was large (about half the size as my pinkie fingernail) an very bright. the color was similar to a green traffic signal light. it left no obvious trail and fell in what appeared from my vantage point to be a nearly straight down fall. the light did not fade or diminish in anyway but rather simply disappeared at 4-5 degrees above the horizon.
content.summary: Slow descending green (traffic signal green) light falling towards earth lasting 2-3 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Right after 10pm driving sse on highway ih 45 5 miles sse of corsicana texas, observed at 60 degrees left of my direction what at first i thought might be a helicopter hovering off to side of road about 1000 - 3000 feet (hard to tell), but surprised that lights were bright and each color was 2 rectangular bars (horizontal) lights red on one end and  green on other end (appeared to be each end-hard to tell at night) which colors were a little like airplane but much brighter bars, not small round. could not see outline of object but lights appeared to be at ends of a rectangle shape.  what really surprised as i tried to look and drive was after about a mile, looking a bit back at it, i could then see a bright yellow (like bright traffic light yellow) also in shape of bars, not glaring but bright.  this might have been another side or back of a triangle that the angle caused to look like a rectangle. these lights did not look like any aircraft, nor was there any white light or strobe as normally on aircraft.  this bright yellow was nothing like landing lights. the lights were almost like a police car's lights or bright traffic light, but bigger, elongated and steady. it was really strange.   in friday fast traffic i could not stop but wish i had anyway. i'm 54, good long distance eyesight, and have seen a lot of aircraft and lights and towers and this was nothing like that.  it just hung up there, but it may have been moving slowly.  it looked like it was around 1500 feet out and almost the same distance up.  but it could have been as much as 3000 feet or more. i had to judge by how fast i moved past it.   hopefully somebody else saw it too.  please post if you did.  there was a lot of friday night traffic from and to houston-dallas route. somebody's bound to have seen it.  b.D.  dallas area.
content.summary: 100 ft long rectangle - light bars on sides hovering about 2000 ft from road 1000 ft alt

content.detailedDescription: It was late at night, at approximately 1:10am. myself and a family member (eyewitness #1 and eyewitness #2 respectively) just arrived home. it was a clear night sky with visible stars. just as i entered the front of my house, i happened to look to the left side of the night sky and saw at first, what appeared to be a plane. as i continued to look, the object was unlike anything i've ever seen. in simple words, it was a 'rectangle with three lights at the bottom'. the three lights were whitish-yellow.  there was a red blinking light in the middle of the three lights. i was expecting the object to either travel to its left or to its right, something i'm familiar with, indicating an airplane. instead, much to my surprise, it was slowly and gently descending. i immediately asked family member (eyewitness #2) to get the camcorder from inside the house. during this time, i continued to look at the object, but the object was becoming fainter as seconds passed by. eyewitness #2 then gave me the camcorder and with the camera in hand, i tried to film the object but by that time, the object was too faint to be seen with the camera and barely noticeable with the eyes. there was a hill there and the object most likely descended behind it. i managed to get a couple of 'blinks' on the video i filmed but it was just that, blinks and not able to notice the rectangle with three lights. the object was completely silent. as soon as we entered the house, i drew a sketch of what i saw and asked family member (eyewitness #2) to do the same, separately without going into too much details until we compared the drawings. note: eyewitness #1 had a longer viewing time of the object than eyewitness #2.
content.summary: Rectangle with three white lights at bottom/on it with blinking red light in the middle.
content.locationName: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out to my shed at 9:30 pm when i noticed a bright red light in the sky.  i watched it for a while wondering ichat star it was.  then i noticed it sort of blinking.  hovered then moved slowly, picked up speed then stopped.  it grew brighter for a while then started flickering red and white.  then it dissipated . i called my daughter out to see what i was looking at as a second pair of eyes.  she saw appx 1-2 minutes before it disappeared .  there were 2 planes flying in the area at the same time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star like light that moved.

content.detailedDescription: Was walking along northern blvd, headed to pick up my child from school. ever since witnessing ufos on april 27th, i have been watching the skies ever more closely now. it was a sunny and clear day (save for the fact of zig-zagging chem-trails that are constantly seen every day) and i saw the first object headed south a few minutes after 2pm. i was able to track it in the sky upon which i finally arrived to my child's school and then lost sight of it. soon we headed to the playground. there i was able to clearly make out 2 more, also headed in the same direction. i should note all 3 objects reflected the sun light, but only at different times, as it seemed the objects were rotating as they flew past, and not in a very fast speed. i should also note they were very high up, barely recognizable to the naked eye. luckily i wear sunglasses with polarization and allow me to see things clearer. i should mention that the 3rd object i witnessed gave off a reddish color to it. not sure if it was glowing red or maybe the surface was red in nature. i sure hope others saw them too. seems like there's been an increase in activity. something is definitely up!
content.summary: 3 orbs seen flying over flushing, seen at different times

content.detailedDescription: I photographed this on may 14th - but did not see it.  i am sending it because it very much matches jack smiths image from north carolina that he took on may 12th.   just a little back up.
content.summary: Flat topped, upside down  3 dimensional triangle

content.detailedDescription: See above
content.summary: Bright orange light south west of portland maine. appeared to be traveling north east for several seconds. stopped hovered, burt out. observed dark object decending straight down with aid of binoculars.

content.detailedDescription: Was seen from hiway 32 east of chico about 20 to 25 miles...Saw brights lights truned around and pulled over and walked up a small hill..And could see a disk shaped thing that was flat on top with a dome on the bottom..The top had lights that were as big as a small house all around the outter edge all pointing up..It looked to have something like a run way in the middle of it..You could see what looked like heat waves coming up from it...It was big enough to park 30 to 50...18 wheelers from end to end...Was looking right down on top of it..It was in a canon and coved from one side to the other...Watched it for 20 mins. or so...Was no more than a 100 yards from it...No noise...We left after watching it...After we got home we couldn't reminber why we left...No cars came up or down the down the road while we were there...I am vetinam vet...Never seen anything like that on this earth...Have never told anybody but friends...People thing your nuts telling them stuff like that...
content.summary: Vary big disk in a canon

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking out the garbage at little after 10 at night. the sky was clear in that direction. the moon was behind me. i like to look at the stars and pick out constellations. 

at that time i noticed this light. it was about 60 degrees from the horizon. it was larger than most things i've seen. i guess pill size is a good description.

it glowed slightly. it was a red-orange color. it moved around but not in a straight line. it went back and forth and sometimes just paused.

there was also a second light that i noticed a few seconds later. initially it was lower and more southern than the first light, but not by much. the first light kind of stayed in the general area. the second light moved significantly. first it moved down in the sky diagonally. it then moved vertical to the horizon (at this point the objects were far enough apart that i could not watch both of them at the same time). around this time the first light moved higher in the sky and faded away. the second object turned up and moved in an arc that took it to about the same degree at which i first saw it. it moved back into the general area that i first saw them in and the second light faded very close to the spot the first light did.

i have never seen anything like this. i'm sure there's a reasonable explanation. i'm hoping you know what these are just to satisfy my curiosity.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two lights looking e meandered around sky for about 5 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I was at cherry springs state park with a lady friend on the 15th for star gazing. very great area for that, no light pollution, and it was a very clear night. we were laying on the trunk of my car when, at first she noticed it, a red light appeared. it wasnt a planet because it was moving. we seen multiple planes that night, we know it was not a plain, same with meteors, we seen 4 or 5 of them, it was not a meteor, meteors travel one direction, this moved multiple directions.

this thing was very high up and difficult to see until you have your eyes locked on it. it was moving very fast and not in a straight line, it was clearly making turns, at one point looked like it was going in a circle. if you held your hands up about a foot apart, it would of traveled that distance in a matter of 2-3 seconds. and it was extremely high up. in an area with a lot of light pollution you wouldnt of been able to see it. the sighting lasted about 2 minutes then we couldnt see it anymore, we kept staring at the last spot we seen it and noticed movement in our peripheral vision, it was the same red light moving around and making turns. i should explain the red light more, it didnt look like it was illuminating light like a star or the moon was, it more just looked like a red object, from our view about the size of a pin, very small. not saying it was other worldly, even though i strongly believe it could have been, there is no explanation i can come up with but im not an expert, just a fan on learning astronomy and a believer in ufos.

tried to get video footage and pictures, but from our view it was entirely too small to show up.
content.summary: Saw a ufo in the sky in coudersport pa.

content.detailedDescription: When i was about 11-12 years in 2001/02 can't remember the year my mother had  a bad fall and we went to the hospital. at around midnight we got out of the taxi at our house and i it was a clear night as i remember. being the only other person in i decided to sit and listen the radio mains powered with headphones on in my room. it must have been past midnight or 1.00am. suddenly the radio station i was listening to disappeared like a hoover or microwave had been switched on next to me. i had the urge to run to my bedroom window i still don't know why i did this perhaps because i thought a helicopter might be passing over. i then looked up and seen the start of a low flying triangle passing at low altitude i don't remember hearing any noise. it had 3 big white lights at each tip and a larger pulsating red one in the middle of it. i watched it glide over other people's homes before it west off into the distance while all i could see was the flashing red light in the far distance. i knew this was not a type of winged aircraft as it would have been dangerously low and the airspeed would have stalled the plane. it was too big to be a helicopter and considering they make noise what i seen didn't.
content.summary: Large triangle hovering over house (can't find gmt for time zone)

content.detailedDescription:
El d������a viernes 14 de mayo alrededor de las 20 horas, sal������ al patio de mi vivienda, al mirar hacia el cielo puede observar alrededor de 6 a 10 luces circulares. inicialmente pens������ que podr������an ser reflectores de luz como los utilizados en estadios de futbol, sin embargo no hay ning������n estadio o teatro cercano en esa direcci������n. adem������s no observe sombras o un cono luminoso debajo de cada disco como es usual en la luz producida por una l������mpara. me asombre en la forma r������pida que se desplazaban y pens������ que no hay ning������n aparato que pueda producir ese efecto. parec������a que las luces fueran producidas en el cielo y reflejada en las nubes. hab������a aproximadamente 6 discos luminosos  un tanto transparentes como una sombra, los cuales se mov������an r������pidamente hacia un mismo punto de convergencia. en algunas ocasiones cada disco parec������a dividirse en dos durante su trayectoria y finalmente todos los discos converg������an el mismo punto. posteriormente sal������an del mismo punto y regresaban al punto de partida dispers������ndose y despareciendo en el cielo.  del lado contrario se observaban que otros discos sal������an y converg������an tambi������n en el mismo punto, sin embargo eran menos visibles. este ciclo se repet������a en unos 10 a 20 segundos. luego de esto hable v������a telef������nica con mi pareja quien se encontraba en otro lugar para preguntarle si observaba algo. me respondi������ que no y luego de esto de  esto sal������ a fuera de mi casa a cerciorarme si no hab������a algo que produjera las luces, sin embargo no observe nada. de hecho las luces no se pod������an observar desde la calle, ������nicamente en el punto del patio del segundo nivel de mi casa. nuevamente sub������ al patio de mi casa y observe nuevamente al cielo y pude ver que los objetos continuaban movi������ndose en la misma secuencia. entre a la habitaci������n a buscar una c������mara y comenc������ a tomar algunas fotograf������as.  prob������ de varias maneras ajustando el flash de la c������mara hasta lograr captar algo similar a lo que estaba observando.  alrededor de una hora despu������s las nueves que estaban cercanas desparecieron y los discos luminosos tambi������n.
entre a mi casa y alrededor de 15 o 20 minutos despu������s sal������ a observar nuevamente y vi que de nuevo los discos se encontraban ah������. tome otras fotograf������as y alrededor de las 11:00 pm decid������ ir a dormir ya que al d������a siguiente deb������a madrugar.
content.summary: Aproximadamente 9 a 10 objetos, circulares brillantes en el cielo, con movimientos lineales.

content.detailedDescription: This night i was recording the sky with my fathers older vhs recorder on a tri-pod and i had it facing the moon looking south southeast and set to record for a full 4 hours on a tape. this sighting took place within the first half of the tape and was totally silent. i then transfered to my tiny olympus fe360 so i could upload to youtube and show some zoom and edge detection and then to slow it down and zoom to see this object closer.I have the original tape.It was a very short fast sighting yet the sudden complete opposite direction change along with the speed and silence and the brightness of this object was simply amazing. to me this object seemed to be under control.
content.summary: Very short bright white object came towards me as i recorded the sky then quickly shot back the exact way it came maybe 3 seconds in all totally silent and on tape recorded.

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out west kitchen window 9:00 pm saw 3 tiered object on top my yardy, 2 feet sq, maybe slightly taller than 2 feet.  each tier had 3 ovals of illuminated, brushed copper appearance. wasn't shiney, wasn't lit up, i thought illuminated, not pulsing, just there. didn't have sound, no movement. the framework around the bottom similar to leggos, little sections with holes spaced evenly on each piece. it sat flat on top yardy all 3 tiers faced west, tilted up at an angle, heavenward. right by edge of street back property, i thought someone had set whatever it was there.  from window looked for anyone around.  no one.   hurried to door to go outside, unlocked inside door, was about to open outside door i stopped.   was afraid to open that door!  went back to window and watched for minute or 2.  went into living room to think what to do and when i came back was gone!  sure wish i had kept on watching but didn't know it was leaving, didn't know what it was! next day looked around yardy and it's top.  nothing left behind.  no pattern in the dust on yardy top. i immediately drew a picture which i'm sending along with this article. after i had time to think about it i thought
it was either sending a signal to mark this spot, or, was receiving something, possibly energy for traveling.
content.summary: Sq 3 tired item on top my yardy  copper iluminated

content.detailedDescription:
The object sped down and attached to my window frame with a clunk. i opened my mouth to scream for mum and dad but a sudden voice in my head said (don't be afraid i am only a friendly owl) even though i knew it was not an owl it took the fear from me. i stared at it and it seemed to stare back. it was a round lense like eye divided in 3 on a thin stalk with a rectangular foot. the three segmented eye blinked at me as a shutter of a camera. i had become curious and got out of bed to approach it. as i approached it suddenly detached and sped back into the sky out of my site.
   i felt quite excited about it once it had left and ran to tell my parents. they told me i had been dreaming and to go back to bed. it was not a dream but very real.
content.summary: Metallic round object on a stalk protrusion with lense like 3 segmented eye. sped down at speed and attached to wooden window frame without slowing

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette and happened to look at the sky and noticed what appeared to be spotlights circulation in the sky above. i attempted to determine which direction the spotlights were coming from and i could not determine the origin of the spotlights. i continued to view the spotlights and notice that there were circulating in the clouds along the edges of the clouds. it was a partly cloudy sky, so in between the clouds there was clear sky and stars noticeable. that is when i called my family out to view this strange phenomenon. my family were amazed and perplexed as i was. i was still not sure if it was spotlights or not until the clouds starting changing shapes and moving in a southeast direction due to the wind or eart rotation. the movement of the lights remained consistent, moving along the outline of the clouds. my wife staring taking a video of the event and captured actual footage. upon viewing the video, objects were observed that we could not see with the naked eye. in the video you can not clearly see the lights that i explained earlier, but the objects are visible moving in this circular motion.
content.summary: Multiple circular spotlights

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my tiny kitchen making a pot of fruit tea and i became aware of a dull humming sound not very obvious and thought i must be imagining it being as it was late and i was tired. i looked out the window which faces north. i saw a flickering object. i thought it was a plane but as i watched it i realised it wasn't moving, just flickering similarly to how jets flicker with their wing and tail lights - except seemingly more condensed in size in side than the distance of aeroplane lights - i could not tell how far away it was, but it was fairly low in the sky. 

as i realised that's not a plane i opened the window to see clearer, and i thought "that's a mental star, i've never seen a star flicker as much or as colourfully as that before." as if it was reacting to my thoughts it moved in an almost circle and went back to being stationary. so i waved (i like ufos i've seen loads since i was wee), and went to get my phone because it's the only camera i have at this time. 

it was still there when i got back but my phone's camera was unable to capture it and all the pictures i took are completely black asides where i've caught windows of flat's/apartments opposite mine.

i gave up trying to photograph it and just watched with my window open for a while - i don't know the exact time when i first noticed it but when i got my phone the time was 0134. 

in the end i stopped watching it because i had things to do but i was rather pleased at having witnessed star friends in my vicinity. 

later around 0400 i was exhausted and decided to curl up on my couch. i felt all these energy sensations which i am sensitive to and experience quite a lot of the time. i reached for my phone and switched on my ce-5 et contact tool app. it was going crazy with the alarm whenever i brought it near my head and my right shoulder which was cushioned against the back of the couch, and also sort of above me but diagonally to my left side. in the peripherals of my vision i saw 4 tall beings positioned around me - there may have been one to my back but i didn't think to look. 

i couldn't see them when looking straight on. in approximate guess to their height, i think they were between 7-9 feet tall - from my perspective of sitting under them it's hard to be more exact. 

they made me feel very happy and peaceful - however i can not promise that they were a part of my ufo experience or if i was having one of my "spiritual" experiences, i am not able to say whether spiritual experiences and et contact experiences are much one and the same thing because often they feel similar. i think i fell asleep around half past 5am, at which point i have no further recollection of to add to this event. 

i posted asking if anybody else in glasgow had "witnessed a ufo last night?", on facebook in the ce-5 initiative group and was suggested to post my experience here. i really can not verify how long the ufo was there, and my eye sight is not the best and i am aware that my glasses make things look more distant at times. however i am certain it was a ufo, because i've seen so many - most recently most of my sightings have been shared with 1 or more people, but not last night's witnessing.

(as a last note i apologise if i have filled out the tickboxes confusingly, i wasn't sure if i ought to include the tall lights as "objects").
content.summary: Saw flickering object thought it was a plane, then a star till it moved around

content.detailedDescription:
At around 9:15pm, my wife and i were watching some evening television before going to bed, when we suddenly heard a distinct noise coming from our open window. my wife asked, "what is that noise?" to which i replied thinking it was a street sweeper (we live near a suburb construction site where street sweepers clean up the debris left on the civilian roads). when we realized it was "not" a street sweeper, we went on our front porch, where the distinct sound was getting "louder." i told my wife i thought it was a helicopter, but could not see anything right away. 

right at that moment, an object appeared approx. about a mile (terrible with distance; could've been closer/farther - it was dark out being 9:15pm at night)from where we were standing. we were also not the only witnesses, as at least 3-5 of my neighbours stepped out of their homes asking what the noise was. the object was flying extremely low; lower than an aircraft.....It was then followed by at least "6" other object similar in appearance, all heading in a parallel formation, coming from northeast, headed westbound towards arnprior/almonte, on. when all of the object were clearly viewed, it sounded like a "fleet of helicopters" but clearly it was not helicopters.

the night sky made it very difficult to view the shape of the objects, but what was distinct was the multi-coloured blinking lights surrounding the objects as they flew by....The most distinct feature though was the "noise" i cannot stress how loud it was, and how it sounded like a fleet of helicopters.

i got on the phone with the local city/311 asking if there were any reports.....They gave me a number for the local police. the local police operator heard what i witnessed and put me on hold....They then returned saying "i am not crazy" and that there was a "counter terrorist drill" being conducted by members of the rcmp and mp......Funny how i don't recall the rcmp having access to aircrafts.....And why would they conduct the drill so late (9:15pm the event lasted about 5min.) and why in a residential area with (some) farmland? they did not appear to be "airplanes" nor "helicopters" and i also cannot stress how "low" they were flying.....And though i am a terible judge of distance, i will say they looked to be flying only about 1 mile above our houses.

coincidentally, an earthquake occurred here today in ottawa, on where it originated west of here in arnprior, on (the direction the aircraft were flying). i recall when japan, chile and haiti had their earthquakes occur from 09-10', there was active ufo sightings occurring before the quake(s) hit.....The quake registered about 4.8 on the richter scale here in ottawa....

i updated and inquired if anyone else heard/saw anything that night on my social networking outlets, and have received little-to-no feedback......Aside from my wife, and 4-5 neighbours who witnessed/heard this event, there has been nothing else to claim other than the slightly "fishy" report from the local police i received when i made the phone call.

i am not one to fabricate a story like this, as i am not an "avid" ufo believer (though i do not think we are "alone" in the universe) but i can honestly say i have n-e-v-e-r encountered soemthing like this, and am looking for answers....

again event occurrence:

date: thur may 16, 2013
time: approx. 9:15pm
area: kanata/ottawa, on canada
occurence: 6-8 aircrafts flying "extremely" low coming from ne headed westbound towards almonte/arnprior, on area. noise was very distinct sounding like fleet of helicopters or a "train" with blinking flashing lights flying parralel. shape could not be verified as the evening was very dark. approx. street areas where the objects were flying - huntmar/palladium dr. kanata, on & hwy 417 - westbound.

this is not a joke, i have not seen anyhting like this and it was very bizarre, especially with the earthquake occurring the following day almost "12hrs" after the initial occurence.
content.summary: 6-8 aircrafts flying extremely low, making loud noise (compared to fleet of helicopters) flying parallel westbound with flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i where out jogging. when we had finished were playing on the work out equipment in the park. i am always looking at the sky. i love astronomy and the stars where looking great tonight. i put my head up just after showing bella how to use the sit-up aperatus in the park. this thing looked like a shooting star, it came from over our heads and left no smoke trail. naturally i pointed it out and said look at the shooing star.The light was a beautiful blue green with a bright blue core. then it seemed to float like it was completely weightless. as it fell it didn't burn up but slowed down and moved in a zig-zag flight path above a treeline near norman creek in coorparoo. the location is a parkland and it is situated  underneath the flight path for the brisbane airport. this was flying way to low to be confused with a helicopter or some sort of toy. both my daughter and i were alone in the park and there certainly no kids out playing as we had just run near where we suspect it had landed. it was difficult to determine where it landed as it dipped behind the trees and i saw it slowly decent and move further north. both of us were very confused by the object but it seemed like it was under control of sorts. but it certainly didn't behave like an object under the control of gravity. a beautiful first sighting for my daughter.I have seen a few ufo's and obs in my time. for me it is unidentified, i wanted to explore the supposed landing site but my daughter was apprehensive and wanted to go home. sorry no photo's but i really wanted to report this.
content.summary: This thing looked like a shooting star that left no smoke trail. then it hovered...

content.detailedDescription: Driving on major blvd in tucson az at 1 pm. notice what at first is maybe a plane but soon notice it is not moving at all. the object is  a horizontal wavy shape and the texture appears white and shiny. i pull the car to the side and fix my vision upon the object. i wonder if it is just an isolated dense cloud in the sky. it stands out because there are no clouds in the sky at this time what-so-ever. after i discern that it is not really a cloud i start to wonder if it is closer than it seems and is actually a coil that is placed on an electrical wire. i think this because the object is in my field of vision directly above electrical wiring. i am startled by this object and my first instinct is to text my wife to go outside and see the object. soon after the object propels from stationary to mobile. it starts in a very smooth and uniform motion and continues without a noticeable change of pace. i watch for 20-30 seconds as it drifts towards the horizon then i drive off. i glance back a few times to see the object still in the sky but eventually lose sight of it.
content.summary: Wavy cylindrical white/shiny object stationary in sky for 30 seconds then propelled at a uniform speed towards horizon

content.detailedDescription: Thursday evening 5/16/13 around 9:30 pm, my husband and i were drivingfrom prescott, arizona.  we were traveling west on 89 a out of prescott, az past congress junction. we continued onto highway 60, very rural area, and desert.  in the sky to the north at very low altitudes, we saw two small orange blasts of light side by side.  the light was so bright and orange in the dark night sky it attracted our attention.  the lights first started very small like the size of a baseball.  then they got very large like the size of a round object 12 inches in diameter. they began to move rapidly side by side and then one went down lower in front of the other and then maneuvered within seconds straight up.  they got a bit smaller again about the size of one's hand and seemed as if they were playing. then the lights disappeared just as if someone switched them off.  they did not appear to travel away like an airplane traveling from one point to the next.  however, in another 5 to 8 minutes the lights reappeared in the same area and did the same thing.  the bright orange yellow lights appeared about four different times.  the lights appeared somewhat like the sodium lights in the city, but brighter yellow/orange. at first i thought a plane had blown up, it was so bright and so large. i felt very amazed at the sighting.  my husband said no plane could maneuver like this, straight up and down and then sideways as rapidly as these two bright yellow orange lights did and not at this low altitude. we continued traveling and did not see them appear again.
content.summary: Very large bright orange-yellow bursts of light manuevering very rapidly in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I pulled into my driveway about 10:30 pm and as i get out of my car i look up and happen to notice this object in the sky. it is pretty low flying and moving quite slow. i couldn't make out much detail since it was dark but it was large and triangular and even darker against the sky. it made no noise and produced no light. i stood there watching it for at least a minute as it curved smoothly through the sky above my house until i could no longer see it. at first i thought it might be a kite because i thought i heard people in the field near my house but it kept moving. so, then i thought a bird but it made no motion to move it's wings and was far too big.
content.summary: Slow, low flying, large, dark, triangle shaped object that made a curved turn.

content.detailedDescription: Turned west on hastings at the same time a white male jogger was looking into the sky at the same thing i was seeing.....So i know there was at least one witness. looked like a larger aircraft coming in for landing, but then i realized it was not on descent, it was hovering and flashing red, white (maybe white spot lights). when i stopped at surrey hills blvd, the craft was hovering about 500ft off the ground and about 500-600 feet to my south. i then thought to try to get video from my phone (i had just replaced the battery, and the phone previously wouldn't work without being plugged in....So i was rusty as to how to access and use the video camera). i turned south on surrey hills blvd and started the video....The craft seemed to know what i was doing and proceeded to the south as i trailed it at approx 20-25 mph. note that while stopped at hastings and shb, i rolled the window down to hear what sounded like what a "thruster" might sound like on the shuttle in space (an air propellant sound). in addition, i could swear that i started the camera sooner, when the craft was closer to me, but as it is, i only have a view of what it looked like pulling away from me.  i thought it may be a "lighter than air" craft, since sundance airpark is located within 2 miles of the sighting, however i do not believe balloons can operate at night. even if they can fly at night, i'm pretty sure no aircraft can have red lights at the tail (flashing and in a triangular patter). faa requires aircraft light markers to be white strobe at the rear and red and green static lights (port and starboard) on the wing tips. what i would like to find is a good forensic photographer or videographer who can apply the appropriate filters to see what this craft was.  i was close enough at the beginning that i could see that it was much longer than its width, thick like a clay brick, narrower in the middle like a dumb bell but not as thin at the hand grab section, corners appeared to be at 45 degree angles, looked like it was 2-300ft long and several stories high with no apparent windows seen in the dark; at least 6 red and 4 bright white flashing and static lights on very bottom, three flashing red lights at the tail in triangular shape (as seen in the video). i followed it south for .85 miles while attempting to video tape it; difficult due to twists in the road and losing the craft in the trees. i'll upload.  note that i have left a fictitious name, address and phone number as i want to remain completely anonymous i know what i may have in my possession. you can reach me by the provided email address, but it is not often accessed. i'm contacting mufon first, because the only way i can get a copy of the video from my phone it to post on you tube...........I really don't want to do that just yet.  thanks for your input.  ooops, just realized that i am going to require assistance to get this video saved to a file. i've tried emailing to myself but it won't go through. the only option from my tmobile mytouch phone that i can see may work would be to upload to youtube.
content.summary: Ufo in far nw okc; cell phone video

content.detailedDescription:
9:27pst cardiff by the sea, california, marine layer is heavy, i'm taking out trash and am forced to look up and acknowledge a bright glowing red/orange fireball that is far away but i can see it glow beyond the marine layer, it appeared to flicker, travel nw, but appears to travel back south, gets bright then dimmed out to nothing in the sky.

i was completely mesmerized by this dance and assumed it was a comet, satellite, or shooting star, so i didn't think to record it on my phone...But when i saw the object, round in nature, change direction, i ran in and got my phone. by this time 2 minutes passed and who knows how long it had been glowing since i first saw it. it appeared to shake back and forth, then loose it's color. i saw it positioned in the west, travel nw, light a slow shooting star, the completely turn direction to south...

i texted my neighbor who is an astronomy buff:

"is there a comet tonight?"
"i just saw a bright orange light in sky that was moving odd ways and it was bright for about 2 minutes then dimmed and now gone!"

i never got a text back from him...I don't see any stars and no planes. it looked like someone was flashing their headlight from the sky at me! this was so cool!
content.summary: Marine layer in bright orange red "fireball" in sky and changes flight pattern

content.detailedDescription: I stopped at the stop sign at moore rd and dean still rd , my truck was facing east . i looked right to turn on to moore rd to head south and i hit the breaks on my truck very fast i thought there was another truck right in front of me . i blinked my eyes and looked out the windshield and it was a bright reddish orange light hovering about 100 to 200 ft over moore rd . i put the truck in park and opened my door to get out and get a better look and when i got out it went up . to maybe 400 ft then the light or glow went almost out like it was now a dull glow then it went south and then east and dissapeard .When i say it was at 200 ft , i mean it appeared 200 ft from the road into the sky . im judging this because i know that the power polls on moore rd range from 40 to 50 ft in the air and it looked 4 times that distance from the ground . and as far as the distance from my truck it was about 3/4 to a mile .I have never seen  any thing like it . what is strange to me is that how can something move and make no sound at all . how can something float in the air and make no sound and i be so close to it .
content.summary: Orange red glowing shape in sky

content.detailedDescription: I walked out front of my house at 10:30pm and the object immediately caught my eye, it was flying very low and had no sound, 5 lights in a triangle/ warped rectangle shape with a red pulsating light in the center. i watched the object fly from west to east over west wichita. i saw other airplanes in the area and also saw and heard jet aircraft very high in altitude, all the planes i saw in the area had flashing red and blue lights with a strobe like characteristics. "normal looking" this object had a very slow pulsating red and orange light in the center and looked very abnormal and different than any other aircraft i've seen before.
content.summary: Went out front of my house and saw five lights in a triangle shape with a flashing red/orange light in the center

content.detailedDescription: On may 8th 2013 i was walking out of my local walmart in sebring, fl headed towards my car. i walked out the doors of the general merchandise side of the building and looked before crossing into the parking lot. shortly after getting into the main drag coming into the store something told me in the back of my head to look up. just as i did i happened to notice 2 extremely bright yellow, yellow/orange lights in the sky. i'm not sure how high into the air they were but they were side by side, towards mcdonald's across hwy 27. then out of the blue the one on the left just faded out kind of like someone turned it off with a dimmer switch, and a few seconds later the other one did the same thing. that's when i happened to notice that i was not alone in viewing this, about 10 other shoppers in the parking lot had noticed it as well.
content.summary: 2 bright lights that faded out independently

content.detailedDescription:
09dec2010, appx: 1am, main st. saratoga, wy.  woke up because bucks were fighting outside my slider & hit the glass. got my cellphone, & quietly went out the frt. door & slowly followed them toward the street. the were focused on something to the wsw of my place & on the other side of the street.  followed to the street the town went black & i was able to get this shot basically across the street but still above us.  the deer weren't scared & i wasn't either.  then the light vanished & with in a minute or so the town lights came back on.              

when i took the photo all that was visiable was the bright lite, nothing else was visible.  i emailed it to myself later that day to make sure that i could save it if something would happen to the phone.  with not having a computer at the time i didn't open the file until last may 2012 & got a major surprise. some how the camera had been able to stop time presay or the shutter speed was just slow enough to get thur the bright lite & get a clear shot of the craft with the lights behind it, in the shape of the craft.
content.summary: Fighting bucks outside my slider window woke me up, got my cell phone & went outside to follow the bucks where stopped in frt. yd. looking up then followed a bright lite wsw of us.

content.detailedDescription: Outside on patio overlooking lake, saw what at first looked like a plane moving from the south east towards me over the lake. the light it gave off grew to an intensity that rivalled the moon (also in the sky) making the apparently size grow double before diminishing. i could see the ufo the entire time while it moved from south east to north west over my residence, which i then lost sight of it as it when over the building. everytime i mentally suggested to flash it did. very awe inspiring.
content.summary: Randomly flashing orb with speed and directional changes
